Reverse image search: The expert employed reverse image search to verify the authenticity of the claim. By conducting a reverse image search, they were able to find the original sources of the photographs and confirm their true locations.
Comparison with known locations: The expert compared the photographs with known locations in Srinagar, Jammu & Kashmir. They identified specific landmarks and buildings in the photographs and cross-referenced them with existing information about the area to determine if the claimed bungalows belonged to the mentioned individuals.
Verification through official records: The expert referred to official records, such as the affidavit filed by Omar Abdullah before the Election Commission in 2014, to verify the residential addresses of the mentioned individuals. By confirming the addresses mentioned in the claim with the official records, they were able to establish the authenticity of the photographs.
Cross: referencing with reputable sources: The expert cross-referenced the photographs with reputable sources, such as Kashmir Life and travel websites, to ensure their accuracy. By finding the same photographs on these sources and confirming their association with different locations, they were able to validate the claim.
